headline: Zebra Study: 87% of Retailers Believe Gen AI to Have Significant Impact on Loss Prevention
summary: LINCOLNSHIRE, Ill., November 11, 2025--Zebra Technologies Corporation (NASDAQ: ZBRA), a global leader in digitizing and automating workflows to deliver intelligent operations, today unveiled the findings of its 18th Annual Global Shopper Study. The research shows Gen AI and automation solutions emerging as critical tools, with 87% of retail leaders citing their importance in loss prevention efforts.
